text_logic_form: The length of the line $PR$ is $12$ units.
Find the length of the line $RN$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $PR$ is $12$ units.
Find the length of the line $RN$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $O$ and $M$.
Point $R$ also lies on the line connecting $P$ and $N$.
line_instances: There are lines $MN$, $NO$, $OP$, and $PM$, forming the rhombus $MNOP$.
The lines $MR$, $NR$, $OR$, and $PR$ are the lines connecting the vertices of the rhombus to the point $R$ inside the rhombus.
